messages.content: Write a letter of apology to a spouse for an extremely disappointing sexual episode.

Dear [Spouse],
I am writing this letter to apologize for the extremely disappointing sexual experience we had last night. I know that I let you down, and for that, I am truly sorry.
I understand that sex is an important component of our relationship, and I take full responsibility for not meeting your expectations. I am disappointed that I failed to deliver the experience you so eagerly anticipated, and I will do everything in my power to make it up to you.
I understand that you may be disappointed with my performance, and I want to assure you that I will do everything in my power to regain your trust and respect. I will work harder to make sure that I provide you with the pleasure and satisfaction that you deserve, and I will do everything in my power to ensure that our sexual experiences are enjoyable and fulfilling for both of us.
I understand that you may be feeling hurt and betrayed by my actions, and I want to assure you that it was never my intention to hurt you. I value our relationship more than anything else, and I will do everything in my power to make sure that we have a healthy, happy, and fulfilling sex life together.
I know that trust takes time to rebuild, and I will do everything in my power to earn it back. I will be more communicative and understanding of your needs, and I will do everything in my power to make sure that our sex life is fulfilling and enjoyable for both of us.
Once again, I am deeply sorry for my disappointing performance, and I promise to do everything in my power to make things right. I love you and I will do everything in my power to make our relationship stronger than ever before.
Yours truly,
[Your name]
Can you make the above a bit shorter and more to the point?

Sure, here's a shorter version:
Dear [Spouse],
I'm sorry for disappointing you in bed last night. I know I let you down, and I'm sorry. I'm going to work hard to make up for it and make sure it never happens again. I love you and want to make our sex life the best it can be.
[Your name]
